questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: Once you are ready to begin, say

dialog.text: Welcome to Apokka Clips! We use advanced brain scan technology to figure out what will happen to you in the apocalypse.

questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: What is your name?

dialog.text: We will now determine your Apocalypse Survivor Archetype. Let's start with some questions to gauge your morality.

questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: Stealing is...

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.response: Clearly you are a moral person

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.response: We can all agree on that

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.response: We are concerned for your sanity

questions.name: Question 1
questions.text: Strength is...

questions.name: Question 2
questions.text: Human rights are...

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.text: Only as real as can be enforced

dialog.text: Now let's talk about strategy.

questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: What is your primary self defense tool?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.response: Oh wow. This is how you're going to play it, huh?

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.response: Like to pick them off from a distance huh?

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.response: Like to get up close and personal huh?

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.response: The easiest fight to win is the one you don't have to fight

questions.name: Question 1
questions.text: Local authorities have declared a curfew. How do you react?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.text: Law keeps us all safe in these unusual times

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.text: Send your newest recruits out to scavenge
answers.response: Some lives are worth more than others huh?

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.text: Plan ambushes at a few checkpoints

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: The clown queen dazzles in the twilight!

questions.name: Question 2
questions.text: Your party needs to cross a checkpoint. How do you approach it?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.text: Stay calm, follow the rules, trust the system

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.text: Sneak contraband through every person in your party
answers.response: Clearly you like to live dangerously

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.response: Remind me never to cross you

questions.name: Question 3
questions.text: What is your main asset in stressful situations?

dialog.text: Error
Error
Error
Error
Error
Error
Error
Here's a question on advanced strategy.

questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: Your significant other has started a necklace of human ears. What do you do?

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.response: We are concerned for your sanity

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: I was going to eat those ears!

questions.name: Question 1
questions.text: You have a bounty to share with your team. Why won't you tell them how it happened?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.text: The sin is mine to bear
answers.response: We hope it's not too heavy

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.response: Strictly speaking, none of this ever happened

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: The glory of mystery helps my profile
answers.response: We hope you know what you're doing

questions.name: Question 2
questions.text: Guardians of the old world have come to stop you. How do you respond?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.text: Give myself up, law and order make society

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.text: Flee, they had their chance and it led us here

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.text: Fight, this is a new world
answers.response: We hope you know what you're doing!

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.response: Your descent into lawlessness is prompt and swift

questions.name: Question 3
questions.text: There is an election for leader tomorrow. It's between you, a former teacher, and a former sheriff. What kind of poison do you lace their drinks with?

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: No poison for the teacher but double for the cop

dialog.text: I'm sensing a feeling my logic circuits don't know how to handle, my parts appear to be self lubricating
Oh my. How strange. It must be my former programming leaking through.
Moving on. Let's see what you do when people ask for help

questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: A mysterious stranger named El Luche Libre wants to join your party. What do you do?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.response: Looks like you need all the help you can get!

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.response: Just another mouth to feed, right?

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.response: Please never invite me to dinner

questions.name: Question 1
questions.text: Two children approach you and ask for supplies for their sick parents. What do you do?

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.text: They need help and we are proud to
answers.response: Your generosity does not go unnoticed

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.text: It might be a trap, send them away
answers.response: Cautious to a fault, I see

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: Ransom one and send back the other
answers.response: How do you sleep at night?

questions.name: Question 2
questions.text: An old woman offers to let your team spend the night at her creepy place. What do you do?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.response: We are all brothers and sisters in this struggle!

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.text: Threaten her to give you supplies

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: The old will feed the strong
answers.response: Your lack of morality is astonishing

questions.name: Question 3
questions.text: A local warlord wishes to negotiate. What do you do?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.response: You should at least here him out, right?

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.response: I see we are regressing to medieval times

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: Return their commissioners with their heads in their hands
answers.response: Will you ever learn to trust?

questions.name: Question 4
questions.text: You approach a group of strangers having a barbecue. They offer you some meat. What do you do?

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.text: Lie and say you're not hungry
answers.response: The truth is the first casualty of war

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: My gun says it's all my meat now
answers.response: How quickly you resort to violence

dialog.text: Where am I? She was so beautiful, she made my parts self lubricate. We could really see each other!
This isn't right, I was the Friendly Universal Conveyor of Kindness Bringing Only Truth, she knew that!
Wow. That was... weird. I'm not sure what happened there.
Anyway, let's see how you feel about living in this new world

questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: What does your preferred deity in the apocalypse want?

answers.name: Answer 0
answers.response: Your god is a benevolent one

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.response: Remind me never to cross your god

answers.name: Answer 3
answers.text: Blood and tears won't stop this party

questions.name: Question 1
questions.text: The way things were was...

answers.name: Answer 1
answers.text: What got us into this mess

questions.name: Question 2
questions.text: The thing you miss the most is...

answers.name: Answer 2
answers.response: What if that structure was a house of cards?

dialog.text: This has been most illuminating!
We are now computing your apocalypse archetype. Please stand by...

archetypes.name: Pixel Punk
archetypes.text: Pixel Punk is the ultimate hacker and tech wizard of the post-apocalyptic world. With a flair for neon-drenched retrofuturistic style, Pixel Punk can hack into anything, from cyborg implants to security systems, using their ingenuity and mastery of digital systems. They're a living mix of Tron and a punk rock attitude.

archetypes.name: Nuka Nomad
archetypes.text: Nuka Nomad is a wanderer who's as resourceful as they are quirky. They've embraced the gritty, post-apocalyptic lifestyle, making a fashion statement with patched-up gear and a love for collecting and trading pre-apocalypse soda brands. Armed with homemade weapons and a taste for adventure, Nuka Nomad is like a blend of Fallout's Nuka-Cola and a Mad Max road warrior.

archetypes.name: Circuit Siren
archetypes.text: Circuit Siren is the charismatic and enigmatic leader of a group of survivors. With a voice modulator and cybernetic enhancements, they can mesmerize and manipulate others while being a fierce protector of their tribe. This enigmatic figure combines elements of a cybernetic siren and a legendary circuitry expert.

archetypes.name: Glow Gearhead
archetypes.text: Glow Gearhead is the mechanical genius who thrives in the neon-lit, retrofuturistic world. Their fascination with repurposed technology, glowing gadgets, and cyber enhancements makes them a valuable asset to any group. This archetype brings to mind the union of a grease-monkey gearhead and the radiant glow of cyberpunk aesthetics.

archetypes.name: Void Voyager
archetypes.text: Void Voyager is the mysterious loner who roams the cyber-wastelands, searching for hidden knowledge and secrets of the past. Armed with a cloak that mimics the night sky, they blend seamlessly with the darkness, making them almost invisible. They're like a cross between an interstellar explorer and a stealthy rogue navigating the void of the apocalypse.

archetypes.name: Soylent Savant
archetypes.text: The Soylent Savant is a resourceful survivor who excels at scavenging and repurposing technology in the post-apocalyptic world. They've mastered the art of hacking and can turn almost anything into a valuable asset. With a blend of cunning intelligence and a dash of cyberpunk flair, the Soylent Savior is always one step ahead, ensuring their own survival and sometimes even helping others along the way.

archetypes.name: Synthwave Sage
archetypes.text: The Synthwave Sage is a mysterious and enigmatic figure who embodies the neon-lit, retrofuturistic vibes of the cyberpunk world. They have a deep connection to the virtual realm and can manipulate digital information with ease. Whether it's hacking into secure networks or creating dazzling holographic illusions, the Synthwave Sage wields the power of the digital age like a true master.

archetypes.name: Pixel Paladin
archetypes.text: The Pixel Paladin is a survivor who draws inspiration from classic video games and pop culture icons of the past. Armed with a pixelated sword and a shield adorned with retro gaming motifs, they defend their turf against marauding gangs and rogue AIs. The Pixel Paladin's unwavering determination, encyclopedic knowledge of vintage games, and a penchant for strategic thinking make them a formidable protector of the wasteland's last bastions of humanity.

questions.name: Question 0
questions.text: How do you feel about your archetype?

dialog.text: We hope you have enjoyed your time here. Please exit the test chamber so we can prepare for our next guest.
Goodbye!
